trans-unit.source: Allows a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> to create and manage execution contexts for its child activities.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> para criar e gerenciar contextos de execução para suas atividades filho.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Marks an execution context as completed.
trans-unit.target: Marca um contexto de execução como concluída.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime enables this operation to succeed only if the activity in the execution context being completed is in the `Closed` state.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho permite que essa operação seja bem-sucedida somente se houver atividade no contexto de execução seja concluída no `Closed` estado.

trans-unit.source: The `forcePersist``Boolean` parameter indicates whether the completed execution context should be persisted so that it is available for retrieval at a later time (for example, for compensation to run).
trans-unit.target: O `forcePersist``Boolean` parâmetro indica se o contexto de execução concluída deve ser persistido para que ele está disponível para recuperação em um momento posterior (por exemplo, para a compensação ser executado).

trans-unit.source: The overload of CompleteExecutionContext that does not have the `forcePersist` parameter effectively uses a value of `false`, so that by default, completed execution contexts are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: A sobrecarga do CompleteExecutionContext que não tenha o `forcePersist` parâmetro efetivamente usa o valor de `false`, de modo que, por padrão, os contextos de execução concluída não são persistentes.

trans-unit.source: The designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Designado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: childContext is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: childContexté uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: childContext is not contained in this instance's .
trans-unit.target: childContextnão está contido nesta instância .

trans-unit.source: Marks an execution context as completed.
trans-unit.target: Marca um contexto de execução como concluída.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime enables this operation to succeed only if the activity in the execution context being completed is in the `Closed` state.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho permite que essa operação seja bem-sucedida somente se houver atividade no contexto de execução seja concluída no `Closed` estado.

trans-unit.source: The `forcePersist``Boolean` parameter indicates whether the completed execution context should be persisted so that it is available for retrieval at a later time (for example, for compensation to run).
trans-unit.target: O `forcePersist``Boolean` parâmetro indica se o contexto de execução concluída deve ser persistido para que ele está disponível para recuperação em um momento posterior (por exemplo, para a compensação ser executado).

trans-unit.source: The overload of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContextManager.CompleteExecutionContext%2A> that does not have the `forcePersist` parameter effectively uses a value of `false`, so that by default, completed execution contexts are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: A sobrecarga do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContextManager.CompleteExecutionContext%2A>que não tem o `forcePersist` parâmetro efetivamente usa o valor de `false`, de modo que, por padrão, os contextos de execução concluída não são persistentes.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContextManager.CompleteExecutionContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Designado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> that indicates whether the completed context will be persisted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>que indica se o contexto completo será persistente.

trans-unit.source: childContext is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: childContexté uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: childContext is not contained in this instance's .
trans-unit.target: childContextnão está contido nesta instância .

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for the designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> para designado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Designado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The created <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for the designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O criado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> para designado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: activity is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: activity is not a valid child activity of owner of this context.
trans-unit.target: activitynão é uma atividade filho válido do proprietário deste contexto.

trans-unit.source: Represents the set of execution contexts, created by the current activity, that have not yet been completed.
trans-unit.target: Representa o conjunto de contextos de execução, criada pela atividade atual, que ainda não foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: The collection that contains the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: A coleção que contém o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref>(~ / add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) associado a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> associated with the designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> associado designado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first context for an activity with the same qualified name as the designated activity.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o primeiro contexto para uma atividade com o mesmo nome qualificado de atividade designado.

trans-unit.source: The designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Designado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> associated with the designated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> associado designado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: activity is a null reference ( in Visual basic).
trans-unit.target: activityé uma referência nula ( no Visual basic).

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the persisted <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> corresponding to the designated <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o persistente <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> correspondente designado <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The designated <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: O operador designado <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The persisted <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> corresponding to the designated <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: Persistente <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> correspondente designado <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Represents the set of execution contexts, created by the current activity, that have been completed and were persisted upon their completion.
trans-unit.target: Representa o conjunto de contextos de execução, criada pela atividade atual, que foram concluídas e foram persistentes após sua conclusão.

trans-unit.source: The collection of type <xref:System.Guid> that represents the set of all persisted <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de tipo <xref:System.Guid>que representa o conjunto de todos os persistentes <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>
